experiences.name: Clay Station Pottery Workshop
experiences.description: Beginner-friendly pottery wheel session. Small batches of 4-6 people. Instructor Priya guides you through centering clay and shaping your first bowl. Take home your creation after firing.
experiences.lore: Started by a former tech professional who quit to pursue ceramics full-time

experiences.name: Third Wave Coffee Roasters - Koramangala
experiences.description: Single-origin pour-overs and espresso. Baristas explain bean origins. Community table perfect for solo visitors. Try the Chikmagalur estate beans.
experiences.lore: One of India's first specialty coffee roasters, pioneered the third wave movement

experiences.name: Jayanagar Walking Food Tour
experiences.description: Heritage South Indian breakfast trail. Visit 5 iconic eateries: dosa, idli, filter coffee. Guide shares stories of 50-year-old establishments.
experiences.lore: Covers restaurants that have been family-run for three generations

experiences.name: Rangoli Metro Art Gallery
experiences.description: Free art installations in metro station. Rotating exhibits by local artists. Perfect for a quick cultural stop between activities.
experiences.lore: Part of Namma Metro's initiative to make public transport spaces cultural hubs

experiences.name: Cubbon Park Heritage Walk
experiences.description: Guided walk through 150-year-old park. Learn about colonial architecture, rare trees, and park's role in city history. Group of 15-20 people.
experiences.lore: Named after Sir Mark Cubbon, British commissioner who expanded the park in 1870s

experiences.name: Atta Galatta Bookstore Cafe
experiences.description: Independent bookstore with cafe. Regular author events and book clubs. Solo-friendly atmosphere with communal seating. Great for meeting fellow readers.
experiences.lore: Founded by former Flipkart employees passionate about indie publishing
